# sha256
sha256:[0-9a-f]{64}
\b[0-9a-zA-Z]{50,64}\b
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{6,}\b

# sha-1
"[0-9a-f]{40}"
\b[0-9a-f]{40}\b

# hex digits including css/html color classes:
(?:[\\0][xX]|\\u|[uU]\+|#|\%23)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR]{2,}[uU]?[lL]{0,2}\b
# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\1{3,}\b

# bcrypt
\$2y\$\d\d\$[0-9a-zA-Z/]{53}\b

# tar arguments
\b(?:)tar(?:\s+-[a-zA-Z]+|\s[a-z]+)+

# <word>vX
v\d+(?:\b|(?=[a-z]))
